title: The Northern Kyushu Mystery Tour (Moji Arc)

sections.Trivia:
- Masumi Sera doesn't appear in this episode, but she is cited by Ran during the trip.
- Torahiko Fukamachi's car is a 2002 Purple Burgundy BMW 325i (E46/4; Facelift). The license plate number is 小倉 301, さ 25-46 (Kokura 301, Sa 25-46).
- In the end, the place where Kogoro receives his prize is in Aruaru City, a shopping mall in Kokura.
- The Kokura police cars are the same as the one who appeared in Mystery of the Burning Tent and The High School Girl Trio's Secret Café, but with the license place of Kokura instead of Shinjuku.
